description:
Your attention is invited to an exciting logical game about vampires, which will force you to make a lot of effort to pass difficult levels.

- Logical game
- Multiple levels
- Interesting idea
- Suitable for children

Have you ever wanted to watch how vampires hunt? To take part in this difficult process for the purpose also it's necessary to solve logic problems? If so, then you are interested in the correct game. After all, here you have to solve difficult puzzles about how get to your destination, this may not be so easy as it seems at first glance, go through many levels and infect the vampirism of all!
name: The Vampires
intro: An interesting puzzle with an unusual idea. Play as a vampire and swap all people.
